alert.note: Alert for Dallam; Hartley; Moore; Oldham; Potter; Sherman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 23 at 4:23PM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Oldham, northwestern Potter, southern Sherman, southeastern Dallam, Moore and eastern Hartley Counties through 515 PM CST... At 423 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles north of Hartley to 10 miles northeast of Channing to 5 miles northeast of Boys Ranch. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dumas, Hartley, Cactus, Sunray, Four Way, Valley De Oro, Boys Ranch, Masterson, and Lake Meredith. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Dallam; Hartley; Moore; Oldham; Potter; Sherman
